# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product comes with exceptional features that promise to enhance your daily experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering this remarkable product at an introductory special price of $99. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your routine with something truly special. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $99. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $99
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
